headline: Verizon (VZ) Edges Lower in Morgan Stanley’s Target Reset Amid Competitive Priorities
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is included among the 11 Best Low Priced Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On December 10, Morgan Stanley analyst Benjamin Swinburne reduced the firm’s price target on Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) to $47 from $48 and kept an Equal Weight rating on the shares.
